author: Paqi
body:
Current: The [New-AzureDeployment](https://github.com/Azure/azure-docs-powershell/blob/master/azuresmps-4.0.0/Azure/New-AzureDeployment.md) cmdlet's `-Package` parameter allows users to refer to a package (.cspkg) file that's either on the user's machine via a local filepath, or in blob storage via the blob's URL. However, the `-Configuration` parameter only allows users to refer to a configuration (.cscfg) file via a local filepath.

Desired: The `-Configuration` parameter should allow for users to refer to a  configuration (.cscfg) file that's in blob storage via the blob's URL, in addition to a local file path.
